entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 5.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
